data.label: FMCG Primary Sales Template
data.author: Aseem Agarwal
data.authorDetails: Asseem has been heading the IT division in Asian Paints for more than 10 years helping build and manage over 40 applications to streamline their field operations.
data.description: This template is based upon similar processes implemented at  major Asian Paints. Asian Paints has used these apps to help their sales teams acheive 20% increase in visit operations

data.label: Telecom - Attendance Management
data.description: The attendance management app is being used in Vodafone to help them ensure their sales teams are on time in distributor locations, their daily targets are planned and they complete the mandatory working hours
data.author: Harshada Wadare
data.authorDetails: Harshada has 3 years of experience managing on ground teams in large organizations like Vodafone and Pepsico.
